Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.clientSide.viewers.toGUI.helperPanels.gamePanel.board.subTurnPanel

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BuildBlockSubTurnPanel
    Class to represent the Panel at the side of the board when the sub turn is BUILD_BLOCK and the playing player is the actual player.
    BuildDomeSubTurnPanel
    Class to represent the Panel at the side of the board when the sub turn is BUILD_DOME and the playing player is the actual player.
    BuildSubTurnPanel
    Class to represent the Panel at the side of the board when the sub turn is BUILD and the playing player is the actual player.
    MoveSubTurnPanel
    Class to represent the Panel at the side of the board when the sub turn is MOVE and the playing player is the actual player.
    NoActionSubTurnPanel
    Class to represent the Panel at the side of the board when the sub turn does not allow the player to do anything.
    NoPositionPanel
    Class to represent the Panel at the side of the board when the sub turn is OPPONENT_PLACEWORKER.
    OpponentBuildSubTurnPanel
    Class to represent the Panel at the side of the board when the sub turn is OPPONENT_BUILD.
    OpponentMoveSubTurnPanel
    Class to represent the Panel at the side of the board when the sub turn is OPPONENT_MOVE.
    OpponentSelectWorkerSubTurnPanel
    Class to represent the Panel at the side of the board when the sub turn is OPPONENT_SELECTWORKER.
    PlaceWorkerSubTurnPanel
    Class to represent the Panel at the side of the board when the sub turn is PLACEWORKER and the playing player is the actual player.
    PlayerSubTurnPanel
    Class to represent the Panel at the side of the board showing the name of the player and the image relative to the sturn phase.
    SelectCardPanel
    Class to represent the Panel at the side of the board when the sub turn is SELECTCARD.
    SelectWorkerSubTurnPanel
    Class to represent the Panel at the side of the board when the sub turn is SELECTWORKER and the playing player is the actual player
    SubTurnPlayingPanel
    Class to represent the Panel at the side of the board when the sub turn of the current player.
